articles.description: Redmi Note 9 Pro will go on sale again on May 26 at 12 noon via Amazon and Mi.com. The phone comes with a 6.67-inch full-HD+ display, quad rear cameras, and Qualcomm Snapdragon 720G SoC.
articles.content: Redmi Note 9 Pro will go on sale again at 12 noon on May 26 via Amazon and Mi.com. Xiaomi had hosted the latest flash sale for the Redmi Note 9 Pro on May 19, after restrictions on e-commerce deliveries were lifted from the Red zone districts as well. This is… [+2522 chars]

articles.title: Simple trick to enable dark mode in WhatsApp Web - The Indian Express
articles.description: Dark mode is already available across several applications including WhatsApp, YouTube, Facebook, Messenger and so on. Here's an extremely easy trick to enable dark mode on WhatsApp Web.
articles.content:

Updated: May 20, 2020 8:21:54 am

articles.title: Porsche’s newest app lets buyers track the progress of their 911 - TechCrunch

articles.title: Motorola Edge+ goes official in India, sales start on May 26 - Gizchina.com
articles.description: After many teasers, the recently released Motorola Edge+ 5G has been announced in India. Sales start at Flipkart on May 26.
articles.content: After many teasers, the Motorola Edge+ is finally going official in India. The flagship was released in the last month, however, due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, and India’s lockdown the company had to postpone the launch in the country until now. Despit… [+1651 chars]
